markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Secondary Casters](/Rules.aspx?ID=780)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 408 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Many rituals need additional secondary casters, who also don’t need to be able to cast spells. Unlike a primary caster, a secondary caster doesn’t need a minimum level or skill proficiency. The Secondary Casters entry, if present, indicates the minimum number of secondary casters required.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Secondary Casters
search_markdown:

Chapter 7: Spells / Rituals
</additional-info>
text: Secondary Casters Source Core Rulebook pg. 408 4.0 Many rituals need additional secondary casters, who also don’t need to be able to cast spells. Unlike a primary caster, a secondary caster doesn’t need a minimum level or skill proficiency. The Secondary Casters entry, if present, indicates the minimum number of secondary casters required.
